dmca.title: Cease and Desist Notification
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Terry Jepson [mailto:legal@wiscocomputing.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2007 2:35 PM
To: jessica@interactivegroupinc.net
Cc: Copyright; copyright@wiscocomputing.com
Subject: Cease and Desist Notification

 

Cease and Desist Notification

 

To: Jessica Noriega  jessica@interactivegroupinc.net

  Interactive Group Inc 

  Addison House Plaza, Obarrio 

  Ave Samuel Lewis y Calle 57 

  Panama, Panama 00000 

  Panama 

  (954) 793-4172

 

CC: The Planet.com Internet Services copyright@theplanet.com

390 Benmar Suite 200 

Houston, TX 77060 

US 

+1-713-579-2850 

 

Date: April 30, 2007

 

Your web site page at
http://www.creditcardstation.net/articles/31-Ways-to-Minimize-Credit-Car
d-Fraud contains the unauthorized use of my copyrighted article. I never
gave your web site, or any person connected with your web site
permission to use my copyrighted article on your web site. Your web site
also removed my copyright notice from my article. My article is not and
has never been in the public domain.

 

My article 'Merchant Credit Card Fraud' was originally published in
September 2001 by The Association of Shareware Professionals (ASP) for
their members. This can be verified by contacting the editor or
executive director of the ASP at www.asp-shareware.org. The article was
expanded and published again in July 2004, and August 2004. Shortly
after that, the expanded article was published on my web site at
http://www.wiscocomputing.com/articles/ccfraud.htm. As you are well
aware, the major search engines can also examine their databases to
determine the source and date of the original web content.

 

You never sought and I never granted your web site permission to use my
copyrighted article on your web site. My copyrighted article must be
removed from your web site within the next 48 hours. If this incident of
copyright infringement is not resolved to my satisfaction by this
deadline, I will take further actions.

 

Further actions against you will include, but not be limited to the
following:

 

I will send a DMCA Notice and Takedown Letter to your web host,
Everyones Internet - copyright@theplanet.com
http://www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Inf
ringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf, and demand your web host take down
the infringing content.

 

I will also send a DMCA Notice and Takedown Letter requesting Google -
http://www.google.com/dmca.html, Yahoo -
http://info.yahoo.com/legal/us/yahoo/utos/utos-173.html (Section 26),
and MSN - http://www.microsoft.com/info/cpyrtInfrg.htm to remove your
web pages from all sites you control from their respective search engine
databases. I will also be contacting other sites that have incoming and
outgoing links with your site, and inform them of the copyright
infringement. 

 

Your web site is also displaying Google ads with my article. I will
submit a complaint to have all sites operated by you expelled from the
Google Adsense program. Google Adsense has Zero Tolerance for displaying
ads with stolen content. Details are at
https://www.google.com/adsense/support/bin/answer.py?answer=9894&ctx=sib
ling The Google Adsense blacklist is for life.

 

Signed: Terry Jepson

        www.wiscocomputing.com

        legal@wiscocomputing.com

        copyright@wiscocomputing.com

 

        WISCO Computing

        P. O. Box 8

        Wisconsin Rapids, WI  54495-0008 

 

Date: April 30, 2007
